data.title: Arthur & Audrey Smith Wellness Center
data.meta_description: Arthur & Audrey Smith Wellness Center Invest in Your health The Arthur & Audrey Smith Wellness Center is a full featured wellness center located on the Emmetsburg Campus of Iowa…
data.text:
Invest in your future, invest in your health. Join the Arthur & Audrey Smith Wellness Center today.

Iowa Lakes' students receive a free membership to the Wellness Center with various membership options available to the general public. Memberships are valid for a 12-month period from the date of purchase.

MEMBERSHIP OPTIONS

SINGLE

$27.38 monthly*

$296 paid in advance

YOUTH (K-12)

$12 monthly*

$143 paid in advance

MARRIED COUPLE

$39.13 monthly*

$423.00 paid in advance

FAMILY

$42.46 monthly*

$459 paid in advance

DAILY FEES

SINGLE

$6 per day

(5 years & under free when accompanied by an adult)

FAMILY

$18 per day for all members of an immediate family

*Monthly memberships are available with a one-year contract though Electronic Funds Transfer (EFT). Please note that a cancelled check or your bank routing number is required at the time of signup.

REGULAR HOURS:

WELLNESS CENTER

MONDAY - FRIDAY: 5:30 AM - 8:00 PM

SATURDAY: 8:30 AM - 5:00 PM

SUNDAY: 1:00 PM - 4:00 PM

INDOOR POOL & SAUNA

MONDAY - FRIDAY: 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM Ι 4:00 PM - 8:00 PM

SATURDAY: 8:30 AM - 5:00 PM

SUNDAY: 1:00 PM - 4:00 PM

Follow us on Facebook for real-time updates and notifications.
